text: Tomorrow It Will Be Better () is a 1939 Dutch drama movie directed by Frederic Zelnik and starring Lily Bouwmeester, Aaf Bouber, Kommer Kleyn, Theo Frenkel Jr.. It was based on the novel Tomorrow is Another Day by Annemarie Selinko. ==Other websites== * Category:1939 drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frederic Zelnik
title: Tomorrow It Will Be Better
